role.argrole: place arg0 is able to live in

example.parse: (IP (QP-SBJ (NP-PN (NR 陈忠发)) (QP (CD 一) (CLP (M 家)))) (PU ，) (VP (ADVP (AD 也)) (VP (VP (PP (P 和) (NP (DP (DT 其他)) (NP (NN 村民)))) (VP (VA 一样))) (PU ，) (VP (VV 住上) (AS 了) (NP-OBJ (CP (WHNP-1 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (VP (VA 漂亮))) (DEC 的))) (ADJP (JJ 小)) (NP (NN 洋楼)))))))
